'''Chris''' was one of the mourners at Pete's funeral party.

==History==
At Pete's funeral, Chris told the story of when his car stalled while he was driving his wife to the hospital to give birth to their child. He'd put off getting a tune-up because they were saving for a baby. He crashed into the ambulance bay at the hospital, but Pete acted like he saw it every day and said they'd have a great story to tell one day. He then delivered their daughter, Maya, right there.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
He is married to a woman named Janie.

===Familial===
His daughter, Maya, was born in the ambulance bay of the hospital.
